newsitem.title: USA: CBOT rice closes lower on liquidation, hedge sales.
newsitem.headline: CBOT rice closes lower on liquidation, hedge sales.

text.p: Long liquidation and hedge selling pressured CBOT rice futures to a lower close, traders said.
"There was long liquidation in the September and new hedge sales in the November," a trader said.
The market was quiet but there were signs of commercial pricing under the market. "There is a sizeable amount of PL480 business (export) for the September through October period," he said.
Rice closed unchanged to 5-1/2 cents per cwt lower, with September down 5-1/2 at $10.04 per cwt.
Rice futures volume was estimated at 300 lots, down from 399 contracts Tuesday.
Rice options volume was estimated at 50 contracts, up from 32 Tuesday.
